pullrequest.title: try getting release-tools scripts using curl instead of hg

content.raw:
I believe that our main problem is before our code to checkout release-tools. We use the mercurial plugin in many cases to checkout the sources of the software under testing. This change could potentially fix the problem for the jobs (like the bottle builders) which do not checkout sources but only release-tools.

A part from this, I can think of other possible problems: the URL schema is also valid for checking tags not only branches? I can remember that some of our jobs interact somehow with the mercurial checkout, for example the [ABI checker](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/4fcab1b35e6da62c556bd208916d8b0a7d7b779a/jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/generic-abi-base.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#generic-abi-base.bash-50). This latest one could be conceptually wrong, but anyway will require changes.
